sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .block(data-aos="fade-up")
        h3.block__title Expert opinion
        .block__content
            p Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque efficitur, commodo purus id, aliquam nunc. Nam tristique vel est at pellentesque. Curabitur pulvinar metus sit amet nisl feugiat pulvinar. Praesent sit amet aliquam nisl. Nullam suscipit euismod tellus, ut condimentum nisl.
            blockquote.block__blockquote
                p Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue. Vivamus nec neque. Lorem ipsum dolor.
                footer.block__footer
                    cite.block__cite
                        .block__avatar
                            img(src="@/assets/uploads/expert-opinion.png")
                        .block__id
                            .block__name Alice Baker
                            span.block__position Technical Director
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'ExpertOpinion',
        data: function(){
            return {}
        }
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .block {
        width: 676px;
        // height: 400px;
        background: #FFFFFF;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(78, 142, 238, 0.07);
        border-radius: 6px;
        padding: 26px 47px 43px 54px;
        position: relative;
        margin-bottom: 56px;

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 30px;
            line-height: 56px;
            color: #357FDB;
            margin-bottom: 9px;
        }

        &__content {
            p {
                font-family: 'Roboto';
font-weight: 300;
                font-style: normal;
                font-weight: 300;
                font-size: 15px;
                line-height: 25px;
                color: #37393E;
                opacity: 0.7;
                margin-bottom: 12px;
            }
        }

        &__blockquote {
            display: block;
            position: relative;
            
            p {
                font-family: 'Roboto';
font-weight: 500;
                font-style: normal;
                font-weight: 500;
                font-size: 15px;
                line-height: 24px;
                color: #37393E;
                padding-left: 15px;
                position: relative;
                letter-spacing: 0.1px;

                &:after {
                    content: '';
                    position: absolute;
                    top: 0;
                    left: 0;
                    width: 2px;
                    height: 100%;
                    background: linear-gradient(172.85deg, #4F91E2 6.49%, #3579CE 113.92%), #357FDB;
                    border-radius: 10px;
                }
            }
        }

        &__footer {
            padding-top: 10px;
        }

        &__cite {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: flex-start;
        }

        &__avatar {
            width: 58px;
            height: 58px;
            margin-right: 19px;

            img {
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
            }
        }

        &__id {

        }

        &__name {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay';
font-weight: normal;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 19px;
            color: #357FDB;
            font-style: normal;
        }

        &__position {
            font-family: 'Roboto';
font-weight: normal;
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: normal;
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 23px;
            color: #37393E;
            opacity: 0.43;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 600px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 100%;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 30px 32px 36px 32px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;

            &__title {
                font-size: 23px;
                line-height: 56px;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .block {
            padding-top: 16px;

            &__title {
                letter-spacing: -0.3px;
                margin-bottom: 0;
            }

            &__content {
                p {
                    margin-bottom: 16px;
                }
            }
        }
    }
</style>
